duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide country based subject matter expertise on the use of MyTime at TWE, supported by up-to-date design documents and similar knowledge management records.
Support the business and technology to ensure the system is configured to meet business requirements.
Maintain systems knowledge management records (SOP, PDDs etc) and retention of subject matter expertise of TWEs use of MyTime and interdependency with our payrolls.
Develop audit reports and other reporting to support compliance requirements.
Maintain good working relationships with the Technology division. Fix/Run: Assisting Technology with prioritisation, SME, business communications for any fix/run issues.
Assist with requirements gathering, scoping change impacts, and supporting business cases for change. Providing UAT testing, ensuring UAT test scripts are up to date.
Develop, manage, and deliver processes to ensure safe and effective systems access for that region.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in HR, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
